Sentencas: A cermet of silver and gadolinium-doped-ceria (Ag-GDC) is investigated as novel symmetrical electrode material for (ZrO2)(0.92)(Y2O3)(0.08 )(YSZ) electrolyte-supported solid oxide cells (SOCs) operated in fuel cell (SOFC) and electrolysis (SOEC) modes.
Titulo: Solid oxide cells with cermet of silver and gadolinium-doped-ceria symmetrical electrodes for high-performance power generation and water electrolysis

Sentencas: The electrochemical performances are evaluated by measuring the current density-voltage characteristics and impedance spectra of the SOCs.
Titulo: Solid oxide cells with cermet of silver and gadolinium-doped-ceria symmetrical electrodes for high-performance power generation and water electrolysis

Sentencas: The activity of hydrogen and air electrodes is investigated by recording overpotential versus current density in symmetrical electrode cells, respectively in hydrogen and air, using a three-electrode method.
Titulo: Solid oxide cells with cermet of silver and gadolinium-doped-ceria symmetrical electrodes for high-performance power generation and water electrolysis

Sentencas: Conventional hydrogen electrode, Ni-YSZ, and oxygen electrode, LSCF (La0.6Sr0.4Co0.2Fe0.8O3-(delta))-GDC, are tested as comparison.
Titulo: Solid oxide cells with cermet of silver and gadolinium-doped-ceria symmetrical electrodes for high-performance power generation and water electrolysis

Sentencas: The results show that, as an oxygen electrode, Ag-GDC is more active than LSCF-GDC in catalyzing both oxygen reduction reaction (ORR) in an SOFC and oxygen evolution reaction (OER) in an SOEC.
Titulo: Solid oxide cells with cermet of silver and gadolinium-doped-ceria symmetrical electrodes for high-performance power generation and water electrolysis

Sentencas: As a hydrogen electrode, Ag-GDC is more active than Ni-YSZ in catalyzing hydrogen oxidation reaction (HOR) in an SOFC and hydrogen evolution reaction (HER) in an SOEC, especially in high steam concentration.
Titulo: Solid oxide cells with cermet of silver and gadolinium-doped-ceria symmetrical electrodes for high-performance power generation and water electrolysis

Sentencas: An SOC with symmetrical Ag-GDC electrodes operated in a fuel cell mode, with 3% H2O humidified H(2 )as the fuel, displays a peak power density of 395 mWcm(-2 )at 800 ?.
Titulo: Solid oxide cells with cermet of silver and gadolinium-doped-ceria symmetrical electrodes for high-performance power generation and water electrolysis

Sentencas: Its polarization resistance at open circuit voltage is 0.21 omega cm(2).
Titulo: Solid oxide cells with cermet of silver and gadolinium-doped-ceria symmetrical electrodes for high-performance power generation and water electrolysis

Sentencas: Ag-GDC electrode can be operated even at pure steam.
Titulo: Solid oxide cells with cermet of silver and gadolinium-doped-ceria symmetrical electrodes for high-performance power generation and water electrolysis

Sentencas: An SOEC operated for electrolyzing 100% H2O, the current density reaches 720 mA cm(-2) under 1.3 V at 800 ?.(c)
Titulo: Solid oxide cells with cermet of silver and gadolinium-doped-ceria symmetrical electrodes for high-performance power generation and water electrolysis
